29.ara-name: كتاب الفرائض عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir bin 'Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah(S.A.W) came to visit me while I was ill at Banu Salamah. I said : 'O Prophet of Allah(S.A.W)! How shall I divide my wealth among my children?' But he did not say anything to me, until the following was revealed: Allah commands you regarding your children's (inheritance): to the male, a portion equal to that of two females

chapter.eng-name: Inheritance of The Sons Along With The Daughters
